text: He imanadaragana! Tomara allahara sahayyakari ha'o, yemana mara'iyama-putra ‘isa ha'oyariganake balechilena, ‘allahara pathe kara amara sahayyakari habe?’ Ha'oyarigana balechilena, ‘amara'i allahara pathe sahayyakari [1].’ Tarapara bani isara'ilera ekadala imana anala ebam ekadala kuphari karala. Takhana amara yara imana enechila, tadera satrudera mukabilaya taderake saktisali karalama, phale tara bijayi hala
